definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be red (? cf. Aram. h.mas. Ethpa. blush, be ashamed, poss. orig. be red);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. cstr. [[חֲמוּץ בְּגׇדִים]] red of garments Is 63:1; poss. also Impf. 3 fs. [[תֶּחֱמַץ]] Ps 68:24 that thy foot may be red with blood (for MT [[תרחץ]]; so Krochm Hi Gr; most, however, rd. [[תרחץ]] v. [[רחץ]]).
